name: caius Ironing Board with Steam Iron Rest, 43"x13" Extra Thick Padded Cover, Compact and Space Saver Iron Board Full Size, Easy to Fold, Adjustable Height, Sturdy Metal Frame
short_description: Stable Structure: Our ironing board is built with a strong and sturdy structure, ensuring a stable and reliable ironing surface. The anti-skid feet provide additional stability, preventing any unwanted movement during use.

Convenient Foldable Design: It easily folds down for compact storage, making it ideal for home laundry rooms or dorms with limited space. Plus, it features 7 adjustable height options, allowing you to customize the board to your preferred ironing height. Enjoy the convenience of a foldable ironing board that adapts to your needs and provides effortless ironing at the perfect height.

Extra Wide Ironing Board: With a generous panel size of 43x13 inches, this ironing board offers an exceptionally large ironing surface. Say goodbye to cramped spaces and hello to effortless ironing. Enjoy the convenience of a larger ironing area, allowing you to iron more efficiently and tackle a wide range of garments effortlessly.

Ironing Board Cover: Made of ultra-thick pure cotton material of protective materials, featuring an innovative heat-reflective function that doesn't absorb heat but reflects it instead. This creates an ideal ironing surface, allowing the iron to glide smoothly over garments. Experience wrinkle-free ironing in no time, reducing ironing time significantly.
Unfolding size: 53 x 13 x 35 inches, folding size: 55 x 13 x 2.7 inches, weight: 9 pounds, ( 7 different heights are set,to be adjusted between 28 inches and 35 inches ).
product_description: our professional-grade Ironing Board, the perfect addition to any laundry room, hotel, or home. Made from high-quality steel, our ironing board provides a sturdy and durable surface for effortless ironing. Its standing design ensures stability and ease of use, making your ironing experience more efficient and enjoyable. With its heavy-duty construction, this ironing board can handle even the toughest wrinkles, allowing you to achieve crisp and wrinkle-free clothes every time. Its large size provides ample space for ironing larger garments, while the tabletop design is perfect for smaller items. Featuring a wide ironing surface, our ironing board allows you to iron garments more effectively and efficiently. The small iron board is ideal for quick touch-ups or for smaller living spaces where space is limited. Included with this ironing board is a premium ironing board cover, designed to provide a smooth and wrinkle-resistant surface. The cover is easy to install and remove, ensuring hassle-free maintenance. Crafted from durable metal, our ironing board is built to last. Its sturdy construction guarantees stability, even during prolonged ironing sessions. Enhance your ironing experience with our Ironing Board, designed to meet the needs of both casual ironers and professionals alike. With its exceptional build quality and functionality, this ironing board is a must-have for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient ironing solution.

name: Ironing Board with Heat Resistant Cover, 43x13 Compact and Space Saver Iron Board,Height Adjustable,Easy to Fold,Stable Structure
short_description: DIMENSIONS: Features a generous 43x13 inch ironing surface with heat-resistant cover, perfect for handling all your pressing needs

STABILITY: Double-leg cross design with non-slip feet ensures a sturdy and wobble-free ironing experience
SPACE-SAVING: Folds flat for convenient storage in closets or behind doors when not in use
SAFETY FEATURES: Includes a heat-resistant iron rest pad to protect surfaces and prevent accidental burns
product_description: Transform your ironing routine with this thoughtfully designed ironing board that combines functionality with space-saving convenience. Measuring 43x13 inches, this compact ironing board features a heat-resistant cover that protects against scorching while providing a smooth surface for effective pressing. The height-adjustable design allows you to customize your ironing position for maximum comfort, while the stable X-frame structure ensures wobble-free operation. When not in use, this practical board folds easily for storage in closets or behind doors, making it perfect for apartments, dorm rooms, or any space where storage is at a premium. The included iron rest adds an extra measure of safety and convenience to your ironing sessions. Built with durability in mind, this ironing board is an essential addition to your laundry care arsenal.

name: Dazzl 360° Dual-Sided Iron Board - Torso-Shaped Ironing Board Full Size with 8-Level Adjustable Height, Detachable Iron Holder, Garment Clips - HDPE Heat-Resistant Surface
short_description: 360° Rotating, Dual-Sided Design: The Tabletop Ironing Board pivots fully so you can iron garments from every angle. Its dual-sided torso shape lets you press the inner and outer sides of clothing without lifting or repositioning it.

8-Level Adjustable Height: Dazzl Folding Ironing Board has multiple height settings, letting users of any stature find a comfortable ironing position. You can stand or sit while ironing without bending or strain, improving ergonomics.

Detachable Iron Holder: The iron rest can be easily detached from the board when not in use, allowing for quick, compact storage. When attached, it securely holds the iron in place, ensuring it stays within easy reach and safely stored between uses.

Dual Garment Clips: Our Compact Ironing Board has two spring-loaded clamps grip sleeves, pant legs and other garments firmly on the board. This holds fabric steady for precise creasing and wrinkle-free results when ironing collars, cuffs and creases.

Torso-Shaped Board: The 3D human-torso design holds shirts and blouses as if on a mannequin. Clothes lay neatly on the board’s contoured surface, making it easier to iron curved areas like shoulders, sleeves and collars.

Sturdy Steel Frame: Ironing Board Full Size has a steel construction with rust-resistant coating and provides a stable, wobble-free base. The robust frame keeps the board steady for reliable ironing performance over years of use.
Heat-Resistant HDPE Surface: The high-density polyethylene (HDPE) top resists heat and steam. It stays flat and smooth under hot irons and steam, ensuring even, consistent ironing results.

Smooth Cotton Cover: A thick, padded cotton cover reflects heat for efficient ironing and delivers a crisp, crease-free finish on clothing. The soft, well-padded surface helps prevent hot spots and protects fabrics during use.

Space-Saving Fold: The adjustable ironing board flat with an easy-lock mechanism for compact storage. When folded, it can also stand on its own, so you can tuck it into a closet or corner when not in use.

Zippered Double-Layer Padded Cover: Our Dazzl ironing board features a zippered, removable polyester-cotton cover with double-layer under padding. The surface ensures smooth gliding and delivers a flawless, crease-free finish with every press.

name: STO STO Ironing Board Full Size 48" x 18" with Iron Holder, 7 Height Options 27" to 37", Space Saving Foldable Iron Board with Removable Covers and Reinforced Steel Legs, Gray Checkered
short_description: WIDE IRONING SURFACE: This ironing board presents a spacious ironing area, measuring 48" x 18". With its wide and sturdy design, it offers a comfortable and roomy workspace for all your ironing tasks

PERSONALIZED COMFORT: Experience tailor-made comfort while ironing with this adjustable ironing board. It offers a range of seven adjustable height settings, allowing you to find your ideal ironing position. From 27" to 37", each height option is equipped with a slot lock feature to securely hold the folding ironing board in place

EFFORTLESSLY IRONING EXPERIENCE: Its extra thick silver coated cotton cover, 7mm felt padding, and steel mesh top create the perfect surface for faster and more efficient ironing. With the ability to withstand high heat and steam, this iron table ensures that your clothes glide effortlessly across the surface without sticking or getting damaged

KEEP YOUR IRON AND CORD ORGANIZED: This ironing board comes with an iron holder, ensuring that your iron stays securely in place, preventing any accidents or damage to your clothes. Additionally, the heavy duty ironing board features a handy cord holder, keeping the cord neatly. And if you don't need to use the cord holder, it conveniently folds down, giving you the flexibility to choose the setup that works best for you

MULTIFUNCTIONAL CLOTHES STORAGE: The built-in clothes storage features a spacious shelf under the board, perfect for neatly stacking your folded clothes. And for your hanging garments, it has included a convenient hanging rail located next to the iron rest.The ironing board is your all-in-one storage solution, keeping your clothes easily accessible and wrinkle-free

name: Ironing Board 48x15, Wide Heavy Duty Full Size Iron Board with Retractable Iron Rest, BlissBoard Sturdy Frame with Ultra Thick Padding, Heat-Resistant Cover, Height-Adjustable
short_description: Ironing Board Full Size: Our 48 "x15" standard size ironing board is perfect for home use, with multiple height adjustments to accommodate users of all sizes, and stable, durable construction to make your ironing experience more comfortable.

Iron Board Cover: Heat-resistant ironing board cover with an ultra-thick, 2-layer cotton padding absorbs heat and creates an ideal ironing surface, enhancing the iron’s glide, making the task quicker and easier.

Heavy Duty Structure: BlissBoard Ironing board is made of premium steel T-legs with non-slip caps and reinforced construction to avoid wobbling while ironing. Also, the metal mesh plate is highly breathable and dissipates heat, making your ironing more efficient!
Retractable Iron Rest: The special retractable safety iron bracket holds the iron safely in place when not in use, preventing accidental burns and damage to garments.

Foldable Design: This ironing board easily folds up for convenient storage in tight spaces or behind doors, optimizing your living area. 56.75" L x 15.25" W x (27"-35")H when open, 55" L x 15.25" W x 2.5 "H when folded.

Advanced Steam-Flow Mesh: The innovative mesh top allows steam to circulate freely, facilitating better moisture release and significantly improving wrinkle removal. Achieve flawlessly crisp results like never before.

product_description: Introducing the Seymour Home Products Wide Top Adjustable Height Ironing Board, your ultimate ironing solution that redefines efficiency and convenience.
